DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate chemical efficacy safety intranasally administer peptide T neurocognitive function HIV seropositive individual . Previous study show treatment peptide T result cognitive improvement HIV-infected patient . Patients randomize receive either peptide T placebo first 6 month . All patient receive open-label peptide T approximately 6 additional month . Neuropsychologic test use determine drug effect .
